use.flag: Depend on app-arch/afio for AFIO archive support.
Install the charon(1) utilities for purging old backup archives.
Depend on app-crypt/gnupg for backup encryption support.
Depend on sys-fs/lvm for LVM snapshot backup support.
Install the EXPERIMENTAL orpheus(1) utility for requesting single files from backup archives.
Depend on app-arch/pbzip2 to allow usage of pbzip2 as a archive compressor.
